name: Ethiopia Yirgacheffe
description: A bright single-origin coffee from Ethiopia known for its floral aroma and clean finish.

name: Colombia Supremo
description: A smooth and well-balanced coffee with rich chocolate notes from Colombia.

name: Guatemala Antigua
description: A medium-bodied coffee grown in volcanic soil, offering a sweet and complex flavor.

name: Brazil Santos
description: A classic Brazilian coffee with a smooth body and gentle sweetness.

name: Kenya AA
description: A vibrant Kenyan coffee featuring bold acidity and juicy fruit notes.

name: The House Blend
description: Our signature blend crafted for everyday drinking with a rich and comforting profile.

name: Panama Geisha
description: A luxurious, high-altitude coffee with floral complexity and a silky body, often winning top auction prices.

name: Hawaii Kona
description: Grown on volcanic slopes, this rare coffee offers a rich, luscious cup with a sweet, clean finish.

name: Jamaica Blue Mountain
description: A premium Caribbean coffee known for its silky mouthfeel and sweet, nuanced profile.

name: Rwanda Red Bourbon
description: A clean, sweet single-origin with vibrant fruit notes, supporting sustainable farming communities.

name: Sumatra Mandheling
description: A bold, low-acidity coffee with a syrupy body, perfect for those who enjoy deep, rich flavors.

name: Bali Kintamani
description: A distinctive Indonesian Arabica with sweet dried fruit notes and a smooth, bold finish.
